name: sonashow
description: SonaShow is a self-hosted dashboard for displaying Now Playing information from media servers like Jellyfin or Kodi on big screens, ideal for party or ambient displays.
features: Now playing display: Shows currently playing media from Jellyfin or Kodi.
Full-screen mode: Displays media information in full-screen for big screens.
Album artwork: Shows high-resolution cover art for music and movies.
Metadata display: Presents title, artist, album, and other media details.
Auto-refresh: Updates display automatically when media changes.
Customizable layout: Adjusts information layout and styling.
Multiple sources: Connects to various media server types.
Screensaver mode: Activates when no media is playing.
Party mode: Displays track queue and upcoming songs.
Theme support: Customizes appearance with different color schemes.
Responsive design: Adapts to different screen sizes and orientations.
API integration: Polls media servers for real-time playback status.
